languages.text: "Значит, он мертв. Сожалею, что ему досталась столь {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}легкая смерть{/d}. Он должен был покаяться перед трибуналом в грехах и сполна вкусить презрения, которого достоин".
"He is no more, then. Regrettably, he {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}found his demise so easily{/d}. Calligos was meant to confess before the court and taste the detestation he deserved."
languages.original_text: "Значит, он мертв. Сожалею, что ему досталась столь {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}легкая смерть{/d}. Он должен был покаяться перед трибуналом в грехах и сполна вкусить презрения, которого достоин".

traits.locale_text: "He is no more, then. It is regrettable that he found his demise so easily. Calligos was meant to confess before the court and taste the detestation he deserved."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "He is no more, then. Regrettably, he {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}found his demise so easily{/d}. Calligos was meant to confess before the court and taste the detestation he deserved."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “原来他已经死了。真遗憾，他居然这么{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}轻轻松松就死了{/d}。我本打算把他带到我的法庭上忏悔，让他尝尝他应得的惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "He is no more, then. Regrettably, he {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}found his demise so easily{/d}. Calligos was meant to confess before the court and taste the detestation he deserved."

traits.locale_text: “原来他已经死了。真遗憾，他居然这么轻轻松松就死了。我本打算要他在我的法庭上忏悔，让他尝尝他应得的惩罚。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「なら、彼はもういない。残念なことに、彼は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}あっけなくこの世を去った{/d}。カリゴスには法廷で告白し、相応の憎悪を味わってもらうつもりだったのだが」
languages.original_text: "He is no more, then. Regrettably, he {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}found his demise so easily{/d}. Calligos was meant to confess before the court and taste the detestation he deserved."

traits.locale_text: 「なら、彼はもういない。残念なことに、彼は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}あっけなくこの世を去った{/d}。カリゴスには法廷で告白し、相応の憎悪を味わってもらうつもりだったのだが」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Así que ha muerto. Por desgracia, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}se las vio con una muerte demasiado fácil{/d}. Se suponía que Calligos iba a confesar ante la corte y recibir el odio que tanto merecía».
languages.original_text: "He is no more, then. Regrettably, he {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}found his demise so easily{/d}. Calligos was meant to confess before the court and taste the detestation he deserved."

traits.locale_text: «Así que ha muerto. Por desgracia se las vio con una muerte demasiado fácil. Se suponía que Calligos iba a confesar ante la corte y recibir el odio que tanto merecía».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Dann ist er nicht länger. Bedauerlich, dass er {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}sein Ende so schnell gefunden hat{/d}. Calligos hätte vor Gericht gestehen sollen und die Verachtung spüren, die er verdient hat."
languages.original_text: "He is no more, then. Regrettably, he {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}found his demise so easily{/d}. Calligos was meant to confess before the court and taste the detestation he deserved."

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist er nicht länger. Bedauerlich, dass er sein Ende so schnell gefunden hat. Calligos hätte vor Gericht gestehen sollen und die Verachtung spüren, die er verdient hat."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Je m'en réjouis, même s'il est regrettable qu'il ait {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}péri aussi facilement{/d}. Il devait se confesser devant mon tribunal et subir le châtiment qu'il méritait. »
languages.original_text: "He is no more, then. Regrettably, he {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}found his demise so easily{/d}. Calligos was meant to confess before the court and taste the detestation he deserved."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'en réjouis, même s'il est regrettable qu'il ait péri aussi facilement. Il devait se confesser devant mon tribunal et subir le châtiment qu'il méritait. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Artık aramızda değil demek. Yazık ki {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}Ölümü kolay olmuş{/d}. Calligos'un mahkeme önünde suçlarını itiraf etmesi ve hak ettiği nefretin tadına bakması gerekiyordu."
languages.original_text: "He is no more, then. Regrettably, he {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}found his demise so easily{/d}. Calligos was meant to confess before the court and taste the detestation he deserved."

traits.locale_text: "Artık aramızda değil demek. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleDead}Ölümü kolay olmuş{/d} ne yazık ki. Calligos'un mahkeme önünde suçlarını itiraf etmesi ve hak ettiği nefretin tadına bakması gerekiyordu."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
